Html: Is there a way to filter out Hard Mode drops from example Uldaur 10man.  In Boomkin it shows Boots of Fiery Resolution http://www.wowhead.com/?item=45135#dropped-by as an upgrade, i went to wowhead to find out this drop requires you to leave 4 towers up.
I think he is pointing out the fact that the last couple of releases, the T8 HM filters were deleted.
I was actually wondering the same thing.
Looking into this, they shouldn't be deleted...
Pretty sure that specific filter has been gone for the past 2 versions.
